description:
http://anidb.net/ch2215 [Morisato Keiichi] is looking forward to university life. But he does not have much luck with anything, be they clubs, love, or daily life. And as it turns out he actually was born under an unlucky star.
One day Keiichi is stuck with having to watch the dorm while his fellow seniors are away at some party, and to make things worse a mountain of work was forced on him. But good-natured — and easily taken advantage of — Keiichi goes right to work, and after finishing his chores, he makes a phone call. For once fate smiles on the hapless lad, and he reaches the Goddess Help Line. A moment later, a beautiful goddess named http://anidb.net/ch2234 [Belldandy] exits the mirror in his room.
But will the goddess help to finally end Keiichi`s unlucky days?

REGULAR.description:
Nekomi Institute student Keiichi Morisato is ordered by his sempai (seniors) to stay at the club dorm on a Saturday night to take and return calls. A nice guy that people take advantage of, he does as ordered. But when he tries to call his sempai, he dials a wrong number...and his world is changed forever.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Kimi wa Megami-sama!?
Ah! You`re a Goddess?
Olet jumalatar!?
Tu es une déesse ?
ああっキミは女神さまっ?

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi makes his wish that Belldandy will stay with him forever, and it becomes true! And it can`t be undone; the wish has been registered with the system. Keiichi ponders what to do now, but his senpais Tamiya and Otaki arrive and find that he`s broken the rules about having girls in the all-guys dorm. What will happen to Keiichi and Belldandy now?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Shinjiru Mono wa Sukuwareru!?
Aa! Voiko hänet joka uskoo, pelastaa?
Ah ! Les croyants seront sauvés ?
Ah! Those Who Believe Shall Find Salvation!
ああっ信じる者は救われるっ?

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi and Belldandy search for a place to live, trying out real estate apartment listings, his friends` apartments, and eventually a fairly worn down temple where a monk lets them in.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Opiskelu, perheeni ja jumalatar!
Aa! Shuugyou to Waga Ie to Megami-sama!
Ah ! Déesse expérience et doux foyer
Ah! Apprenticeship, Home, and the Goddess
ああっ修行と我が家と女神さまっ

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi takes Belldandy to his school, and all the classmates are impressed by the new girl. Sayoko, the popular girl on campus, meets Belldandy and tries to figure out where she came from. Realizing her popularity is dwindling, Sayoko tries to get in between Keiichi and Belldandy, accusing her of not even being a student, and creating situations where she and Keiichi can be alone. But the Ultimate Force that is linked to Keiichi`s wish has other ideas.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Joou-sama to Megami-sama!
Aa! Kuningatar ja jumalatar!
Ah ! La reine et la déesse
Ah! The Queen and the Goddess
ああっ女王さまと女神さまっ

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi left his books and papers at home, so Belldandy goes back to get it. As Keiichi is left alone at school, Sayoko challenges him to stop acting like he`s in elementary school with that relationship. Keiichi struggles on what to say to Belldandy. He sets up a romantic mood at home with candles and all. Will that do the trick? Or will it be written off as another coincidence?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Elämää saman katon alla!
Aa! Hitotsu Yane no Shita de!
Ah ! Seuls sous le même toit
Ah! Living Under One Roof Together
ああっひとつ屋根の下でっ

REGULAR.description:
A young woman shows up at the temple where Keiichi is staying. It turns out to be Keiichi`s sister Megumi, who is in town looking for apartment housing. Keiichi and Belldandy help Megumi find a place, but it has a dark secret.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Horidashi Mono ni Megumi Ari!?
Aa! Löytää odottamatta jotain siunattua?
Ah ! Le bonheur est dans la trouvaille
Ah! A Blessing in Every Bargain?
ああっ掘り出し物に惠ありっ?

REGULAR.description:
Belldandy learns about Valentine`s day in Japan. Sayoko tries to set Belldandy up with the campus playboy Toshiyuki Aoshima. This could be trouble!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Omoi Tsutaeru Basho!
Aa! Paikka jossa voit näyttää tunteesi.
Ah ! Un lieu plein de romantisme
Ah! Where to Confess One`s Love?
ああっ想い伝える場所っ

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi gets a video from a store, but when he plays it, a mysterious woman shows on the screen. The woman is Urd, who is Belldandy`s older sister. Urd tries to move Keiichi`s romantic intentions forward by slipping him a controlling love potion.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Hensachi 30 kara no Ren`ai Juken!
Ah ! Test amoureux, trente points à rattraper
Ah! Can You Pass the Love Test with Those Low Scores?
ああっ偏差値30からの恋愛受験っ

REGULAR.description:
Belldandy wins the Miss NIT contest and becomes Campus Queen. Sayoko and Toshiyuki try to uncover Belldandy`s identity by setting up revealing situations where Belldandy would have to use her magic, but with big sister Urd watching, that isn`t so easily done. Toshiyuki manages to put Urd to sleep by playing Enka music, and Sayoko kidnaps Keiichi. To get Keiichi back, Belldandy might have to reveal to Sayoko the truth about herself!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Joou-sama to Megami no Himitsu!
Aa! Kuningatar ja jumalattaren salaisuus!
Ah ! Le secret de la reine et de la déesse
Ah! The Queen and the Goddess` Secret
ああっ女王さまと女神のヒミツっ

REGULAR.description:
The Nekomi Motor Club is recruiting new members, but now there`s a new rival club called Four Wheels that was started by Toshiyuki. The motor clubs have a challenge race over who gets to keep their club around. Keiichi and Belldandy get to represent Nekomi in the race, but where there`s Toshiyuki there`s sabotage. Can Keiichi and Belldandy pull through?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Jidoushabu wa Katemasuka!?
Aa! Pystyykö Moottoriklubi voittamaan?
Ah ! Le club auto peut-il gagner ?
Ah! Can the Auto Club Triumph?
ああっ自動車部は勝てますかっ?

REGULAR.description:
Tamiya and Otaki buy a strange Demons CD from a store. Not only is the music strange, but a spirit shoots out of the CD and asks what wish they want. Not caring they just wish her to go away. The spirit is the demon Marlier (aka Mara), and she`s ready to mess up the goddesses` plans. Now that the cat`s out of the bag, what will the goddesses do?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Akuma ga Kitarite Wazawai o Nasu!?
Aa! Demoni on saapunut ja kylvää tuhoa!
Ah ! Un démon venu semer la terreur
Ah! The Demon Arrives and Wreaks Havoc?!
ああっ悪魔が来たりて災いを成すっ?

REGULAR.description:
Marlier offers Sayoko a plan to get Belldandy out of the way. Sayoko tricks Urd and steals the Demons CD. Marlier casts a spell to tip Keiichi`s heart balance so that Keiichi becomes fixated on Sayoko. After Belldandy goes home feeling strange, Sayoko is alone with Keiichi. This is her big chance, but what are all these suggestions Keiichi has?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Megami to Joou o Tenbin ni Kakete!?
Aa! Punnitse jumalatar ja kuningatar vaa`alla?
Ah ! Match entre la reine et la déesse
Ah! Choosing Between the Goddess and the Queen?
ああっ女神と女王を天秤にかけてっ?

REGULAR.description:
More goddess-related system problems arise because of Belldandy`s unstable heart. A new girl shows up at the temple, and it`s Belldandy`s kid sister Skuld! She`s there to deal with the outbreak of bugs but also has an ulterior motive, to bring Belldandy back to heaven. To complicate things, Skuld`s bug blasting invention isn`t working and is doing all sorts of weird things. Can Keiichi and Skuld repair the machine in time or will Belldandy have to return to heaven?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Kenelle isosisko kuuluu?
Aa! Onee-sama wa Dare no Mono!?
Ah ! On se dispute ma sœur
Ah! Who Does Big Sister Belong To?
ああっお姉さまっは誰のものっ?

REGULAR.description:
Skuld`s been spending a lot of time with Belldandy, but Belldandy still wants to go to school with Keiichi. Skuld decides to take apart Keiichi`s bike, but ends up upgrading it. Megumi notices the upgrades and starts to critique it. This upsets Skuld, who issues Megumi a mechanic`s challenge. At the suggestion of Keiichi`s senpais, Skuld and Megumi enter a robot battle contest to settle their conflicts.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Opetusmenetelmä nimeltä Viimeinen Taistelu?
Aa! Taiketsu to Iu Na no Kyouiku Jisshuu!?
Ah ! Guerre ouverte et éducation
Ah! Teaching a Lesson Called Competition?
ああっ対決という名の教育実習っ?

REGULAR.description:
Skuld reveals her latest invention: Banpei-kun RX. Banpei is a robot designed to protect Belldandy, which he does easily as Marlier shows up for an attack. But that also means protecting her from Keiichi and Urd and draining tons of power from the house. Can Skuld teach Banpei to play nice? And what will they do when Marlier launches another attack?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Jumalattaren lumoissa?
Aa! Megami ni Kokoro o Ubawarete!?
Ah ! La déesse m`a volé mon cœur
Ah! A Heart Stolen by a Goddess?
ああっ女神に心を奪われてっ?

REGULAR.description:
Marlier`s attacks on the goddesses keep failing so she goes for a new target: Megumi! She takes over Megumi`s body, and solicits the help of Senbee, the God of Poverty and generally bad luck spirit.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Katastrofi saapuu onnen merkeissä?
Aa! Wazawai Kitarite Chabashira Tatsu!?
Ah ! Tige de thé et bon augure
Ah! Misfortune Arrives, and the Tea-Stalk Stands Upright?
ああっ災い来たりて茶柱立つっ?

REGULAR.description:
Club member Sora is entered into an all-girls racing event. Belldandy and the gang help her overcome her fears of driving and of messing up everything.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Mitä ovat lahjakkuus ja kova työ?
Aa! Sainou to Doryokutte Nandesuka!?
Ah ! Le travail et le talent
Ah! What Do Talent and Hard Work Have to Do With It?
ああっ才能と努力って何ですかっ?

REGULAR.description:
Megumi gives Keiichi some tickets to a beach resort. Keiichi and Belldandy go, but the sisters tag along as well. Urd tells Keiichi there`s an island spot where if he confesses it will be true love. Keiichi tries to take Belldandy to that remote island location, but Skuld has other plans.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Kontalokas tunnustus kuun alla?
Aa! Unmei no Kokuhaku wa Tsuki no Shita de!?
Ah ! Belle déclaration au clair de lune
Ah! Confess Your Love Under the Moon?
ああっ運命の告白は月の下でっ?

REGULAR.description:
Urd makes a love candy for Keiichi, but Skuld suspects something and slips in some additional ingredients. Belldandy consumes it, and she becomes very romantically bold in all her actions and with Keiichi too!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Sonna Hitomi de Mitsumenaide!?
Aa! Älä katso minua noilla silmillä?
Ah ! Tu me dévores des yeux ?
Ah! Please Don`t Look At Me Like That!?
ああっそんな瞳で見つめないでっ?

REGULAR.description:
Urd and Skuld leave to do some work back at heaven. Skuld has Keiichi eat some flan which transforms Keiichi into a woman. Now he`ll keep his hands off Belldandy, right? Keiichi and Belldandy go through Urd`s potion ingredients to find an antidote but the formula goes wrong and Belldandy catches some kind of flu, and it`s getting worse!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Megami o Sukue! Otoko Nara!?
Aa! Pelasta jumalatar jos olet mies!?
Ah ! Sauve-la, si tu es un homme
Ah! If You`re a Real Man, Save the Goddess?
ああっ女神を救えっオトコならっ?

REGULAR.description:
Skuld admires Belldandy`s angel and wants to have one as well. Skuld tries training her skills with inventions. Then something ouside threatens the girls and it`s up to Urd to summon her angel, but it`s revealed that Urd can`t because she told her angel earlier to never come out ever again. What will the goddesses do?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Akogare wa Shiroi Tsubasa no Tenshi!
Aa! Se mitä kaipaan on valkosiipinen enkeli!
Ah ! Les anges aux ailes blanches
Ah! What Wouldn`t I Give for an Angel with White Wings?!
ああっ憧れは白い翼の天使っ

REGULAR.description:
Mara retrieves a demonic urn from a cave. Urd`s goddess license had been suspended, which motivates her to look for a regular job. But when things go bad there she accepts her demonic heritage and transforms into the Lord of Terror! Big Trouble for Keiichi and the gals!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Akuma no Sasayaki wa Tsubo to Tomo ni!?
Aa! Demonin kuiskauksen mukana on ruukku?
Ah ! La jarre du démon
Ah! The Devil`s Whisper Coming from an Urn?
ああっ悪魔のささやきは壷と共にっ?

REGULAR.description:
The Yggdrasil system is in chaos from all the attacks from the Lord of Terror. Urd starts releasing the Ultimate Destruction Program which will not only destroy the current world but allow the demons to rule it. Belldandy decides to release her sealed power and confront Urd. God gives Skuld a Midgard Flute as a last-chance vaccine to stop the Lord of Terror. Will those efforts be enough?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Kyuuseishu wa Fue no Oto to Tomo ni!?
Aa! Pelastaja, yhdessä huilun äänen kanssa!?
Ah ! Le son de la flûte salvatrice
Ah! The Savior of the World Arrives with the Sound of the Flute?
ああっ救世主は笛の音と共にっ?

REGULAR.description:
It`s the final showdown where the goddesses, Belldandy and Skuld, battle against the Lord of Terror, who has now possessed Midgard! With the whole world at stake, what can Keiichi do to help? Perhaps another attempt at the flute will do the trick, and that almost works, except now the Lord of Terror has possessed Keiichi!Could this be the end of the world? Will Belldandy be able to save her love?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Aina kanssasi
Aa! Itsumo Kimi to Tomo ni!
Ah ! Je serai toujours à tes côtés
Ah! Always Stay by Your Side...
ああっいつもキミと共にっ
Aa! Megami-sama to no Koukan Nikki!?
Ah! An Exchange Diary with the Goddess?
ああっ女神さまっとの交換日記っ?

SPECIAL.description:
The goddesses are working overtime to restore the damage done by the Lord of Terror, but in order to conserve energy, Urd automatically reverts to her younger form. The more energy she uses, the younger she becomes. While waiting for Yggdrasil to come back online, she is thrust into an unlikely situation with a boy she meets at a playground. Meanwhile, Belldandy and Keiichi work on a cure for Urd`s "condition."
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Urd no Chiisana Koi Monogatari!
Aa! Urdin pieni rakkaustarina
Ah ! Urd vit une amourette
Ah! Urd`s Little Romance
ああっウルドの小さな恋物語っ

SPECIAL.description:
Yggdrasil`s downtime causes Skuld to become a grown woman. She has until sundown, when Yggdrasil is restored, to experience life as an adult. After escaping an uncomfortable situation with Toshiyuki Aoshima, Skuld explores her newly grown feelings for Keiichi, and asks him to go out with her the rest of the day.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Aikuisena oleminen on sydäntä järisyttävää
Aa! Dokidokitte Otona no Aji!?
Ah ! Dans la peau d`une adulte
Ah! Is My Heart Pounding Because I`m a Grownup?
ああっドキドキって大人の味っ?
